title: User Experience Improvement Plan
content:
To improve your experience, continuously discover and fix issues, this feature will automatically upload anonymous information. These include:

ðŸ“Œ Program exceptions: such as crashes, error codes, etc.
ðŸ“Œ Performance data: such as download speed, operation response time, and feature usage frequency (anonymous).

This process never collects or uploads any personally identifiable information, file contents, chat records, passwords, or browsing history.

You can disable this protocol at any time in Settings.
